Text.Page:
The kumases have claimed the Omphalos Plains and challenge our control of the region.

You are to slay {@LinkCreature:7#3#indolent} and {@LinkCreature:7#4#torpid kumases} to establish our dominance.

Report to Heroth at Godric's Farm when you're successful.
I hate kumases. Nasty brutes. They got what they deserved. If I ever make it back to Velika, <PCNAME>, I'm buying you an ale.
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
